thread.title: David Durgin
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by David Durgin

author: David Durgin
title: David Durgin
text: I came in with a flat tire that could not be repaired. The salesperson recommended that I replace it with the same type. He did not try to sell me a new tire or tires for the other three wheels. That sort of basic, low key salesmanship is the reason I have purchased all my tires at Town Fair for at least 25 years. Peerless service.
